text: Cyclidia is a genus of moths belonging to the subfamily Cyclidiinae. The genus was erected by Achille Guenée in 1857. ==Species== * Cyclidia dictyaria Swinhoe, 1899 * Cyclidia diehli Lutz & Kobes, 2002 * Cyclidia fabiolaria Oberthür, 1884 * Cyclidia fractifascia Leech, 1898 * Cyclidia javana Aurivillius, 1894 * Cyclidia orciferaria Walker, 1860 * Cyclidia pitmani Moore, 1886 * Cyclidia rectificata Walker, 1862 * Cyclidia sericea Warren, 1922 * Cyclidia substigmaria Hübner, 1825 ==Status unknown== * Cyclidia fuscifusa Seitz, 1934 ==Former species== * Cyclidia tetraspota Chu & Wang, 1987 ==References== * , 1987: A contribution to the taxonomy and zoogeography of the Cyclidiidae (Lepidoptera: Geometroidea). Acta Entomologica Sinica 30 (2): 203-211. Category:Cyclidiinae Category:Drepanidae genera
title: Cyclidia
